entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grenadier Island 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -15.0°C
Wind: ENE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow in the morning. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
